verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: just in] [ARG0: governors] [V: announce] [ARG1: n22 500 as new minimum wage] labour has been demanding for n30 000 as new minimum wage while the federal government has declared intention to pay n24 000 but in a communiqué issued at the end of second emergency meeting of the ngf in abuja the governors explained that the salaried workers constitute not more than five percent of the total working population nigeria governors africa minimum wage sahara reporters nigerian governors forum wage ngf tripartite committee mr abdul'aziz yari abubakar mr abdulaziz yari abubakar n22 500 federal government federal government of the united states chairman abuja n22500
